page.title: 17LIFE STYLES
page.content: { We asked a local farmer,Mr.Galbraith, {to tell us a little about his life {style. Mr.Galbraith has lived in this area for fifty-two years.He farms about thirty acres,on the Cloyfin Road.He uses the land for vegetable growing, grazing and for cutting grass.He says that the area has changed a great deal with the new housing estate at Ballysally and the new developments such as Farm-fed Chickens,the Council yard,Macfarlane Motors,A.V.X.,and more recently,Exorna Kitchens.The land on which these factories have been built was all farm land used for grazing cattle, sheep and horses,and for crop rotation. Mr.Galbraith, who grazes mostly sheep and goats,says the area has a promising future. .
